description: This file defines a LinkedList class implementing a singly linked list data structure, providing methods for adding, removing, retrieving elements, and computing the list size.

classes.name: LinkedList
classes.description: A singly linked list implementation supporting basic operations like add, remove, get, and size.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a new element to the end of the linked list.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes the first occurrence of the specified element from the list.

methods.name: size
methods.description: Returns the number of elements in the linked list.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves the element at the specified index.

methods.name: unlink
methods.description: Helper method to unlink a node from the list during removal.
